ingredients.content: 1 tsp capers, drained, plus extra to garnish
1 pinch ground black pepper, to taste

preparations.content: Place olives, shallots, capers, garlic, white wine, lemon juice, olive oil, and pepper into mixing bowl and chop <b>Turbo/1 sec/2-3 times<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and chop a further <b>Turbo/2 sec/2-3 times<b>.
Place two tomato slices on each serving plate. Top each tomato with a spoonful of Kalamata Tapenade and a slice of mozzarella. Garnish with basil and capers and serve immediately.
